sections.paragraph: 1. the scale of a balance, a balance, a pair of scales
2. that which is weighed, a talent
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Neuter of a presumed derivative of the original form of τλάω tlao4 (to bear; equivalent to G5342); a balance (as supporting weights), that is, (by implication) a certain weight (and thence a coin or rather sum of money) or “talent”: - talent.
